title: The Canons of the CCXVII Blessed Fathers Who Assembled at Carthage.
author: The Canons of the Synods of Sardica, Carthage, Constantinople, and Carthage

paragraphs.text: The Canons of the CCXVII Blessed Fathers Who Assembled at Carthage.
Commonly Called the Code of Canons of the African Church.
Commonly Called the Code of Canons of the African Church.
